definition: Learning through extended projects that involve investigation and response to complex questions or challenges

positive_examples: Students spent six weeks designing and building a sustainable garden.
The driving question guided their research: How can we reduce food waste in our cafeteria?
They presented their findings to a panel of community members.
The project integrated math, science, and communication skills.
negative_examples: Read the chapter and answer the questions.
training_hints.disambiguation: Extended project work, not short assignments
